overview: In an exciting teaser, the film takes place in an apartment its owner call it "The Waitress" The movie revolves around three people only. A man (Nedal Al Shafey) and his wife (Ghada Abdel Razek) and a thief (Manzer Reyahna). The sequence of events reveals a lot about the backgrounds of these characters. The film sends a message that any human being can make mistakes, regardless of his culture and the environment in which he was raised.
title: The Waitress
